title: R Client for the Sustainable Development Goals API
text: goalie R package designed provide simple interface extracting data United Nations Statistics Divisions (UNSD) Sustainable Development Goals (SDG) API. package allows exploration SDG data contained within, including available dimensions/attributes geographic coverage, providing simple tool extract data quickly R. sdg_overview(), sdg_targets(), sdg_indicators() provide data frames covering goals, targets, indicators SDGs. sdg_dimensions() sdg_attributes() provides data frame dimensions attributes available specific SDG series data. sdg_series() provides list data series available SDG database. sdg_geoareas() provides overview geographic areas covered data SDG database, data specific SDG goal, target, indicator, series. sdg_geoarea_data() lists SDG data available specific geographic area. sdg_data() extracts data selection series GHO outputs results single data frame. interface designed simple possible, requiring input code indicator extract . However, request, detailed implementation SDG API’s systems can implemented. Please provide requests Github issues page. goalie can installed using remotes::install_github("gpw13/goalie")

However, can also continue explore aspects SDG database. instance, wanted see dimensions attributes SI_POV_DAY1, can easily access .
